name: I am a DRILL and I'm DRILLING a hole
name_original: I am a DRILL and I'm DRILLING a hole
description:
Top-down driller made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48.

## Controls:
  • Movement:  W/S
  • Turning:   A/D
  •  Interact:  Q
  •  Restart:   R
## General:

There is a a tutorial

Your goal is to reach the exit on each level and avoid being shot by enemies.

How enemies work: when you enter a range near an enemy, it will spot you and slowly rotate its turret toward you. You must break line of sight before it points at you or it will shoot and kill you.

Running into enemies will stun them for 5 (five) seconds. Once stunned, they cannot be stunned again for a brief time (you cannot stun-lock them).

## Shop Items:
  • Repair: Repairs your drillhead so you can mine again
  • Haste:  Increases damage done to blocks with each hit, increasing your mining speed
  • Fuel:   Fills your fuel tank completely
## Known Issues:
  • Enemies may spawn on top of you
  • Enemies may spawn directly in front of you
  • Exit *might* generate in a unreachable place (should be rare)
  • Enemies can shoot through tiny gaps (partially broken blocks)
  • Enemies appear to shoot through solid objects (should be rare)
